title: Nursing is the only service not tarnished with bribery allegations says President Rajapaksa
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Chandana Perera ) President Rajapaksa said the nursing community that their service is the only public profession which is free from allegations of bribery and corruption so far.
